tool_description: An API shows all latest cricket matches happening now
name: Cricket Live Scores
title: Cricket Live Scores

api_list.name: Get API Status
api_list.description: This endpoint will return API status
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cricket-live-scores4.p.rapidapi.com/api"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cricket-live-scores4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Current Cricket Matches
api_list.description: This endpoint will return live and current cricket matches
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cricket-live-scores4.p.rapidapi.com/api/matches/current"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cricket-live-scores4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
